title: Help w/ Alpha Client
body: Soo in the last couple days I've had a disconnection issue where I'd be constantly disconnecting within games every 5 minutes or so and I tried reinstalling to try fixing the problem, but now when I try to update to the alpha client, it says that LoL has encountered a problem and tells me to reinstall, but I've done that several times and I'm not sure how to fix this. Does anyone know how to fix it? Please let me know if you do, thx.

replies.body: The disconnections were likely being caused by a network problem so reinstalling wouldn't necessarily resolve it.  I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve issues specifically reaching our servers.  This way the updated client can connect to the patching servers and complete the update without errors.  I hope that helps!
Thanks, just yesterday I was using the old client and there were no problems for some reason
